text: Hindi Ko Kayang Iwan Ka (International title: Stay With Me / Lit: I Can Not Leave You) is a 2018 Philippine television drama series starring Yasmien Kurdi, Mike Tan, Martin del Rosario and Jackie Rice. The series premiered on GMA Network's GMA Afternoon Prime block and worldwide on GMA Pinoy TV from February 26 to August 31, 2018, replacing Haplos. NUTAM (Nationwide Urban Television Audience Measurement) People in Television Homes ratings are provided by AGB Nielsen Philippines. ==Series overview== ==List of Episodes== ===February 2018=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:100%; line-height:18px;" width="100%" !
